title: Building a GenAI-powered Excel Add-in - Part 01 - Getting Started Developing Office Add-Ins
shortDescription: Discover how to create a Excel Add-In with Vue.js in Part 1 of this tutorial series.

title: Manage Multiple SSH Key for GitHub on One Machine
shortDescription: Learn how to seamlessly manage multiple GitHub accounts on a single machine using distinct SSH keys, from key generation to repository configuration.
